summary: This mod allows you to move nearly all static furniture in Breezehome.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to move nearly all static furniture in Breezehome. 
Watch the video above for a demonstration. 
Instructions 
======= 
- Start to move an object by hitting it with any weapon or spell 
- Stop moving an object by sheathing your weapon or spell 
- Rotate an object that is being moved by entering stealth mode (crouch) 
Static objects have an invisible body around them that is used for collision detection. Unfortunately, I have not yet found a way to move these dynamically. 
In order to update the collision boxes, exit the house. Then save and reload outside. Then re-enter the house. The collisions will now be updated. ( See the video for example )
author: Ben
